name: The Labyrinth (itch) (DarkLightStudios)
description:
THE LABYRINTH
A 2D singleplayer PC game 
Enter the labyrinth, face its perils! You are presented with choices, explore in virtue or barbarity; your choices become you. 
You have been warned…

Controls

Move with WASD or Joysticks

Attack with SpaceBar or X button

Credits

Lead programmer

Connor Swannell

Programmer + Voice Actor

Jamie Arnold

Artist

Chris Ahmed

Writer 

Jet Sweeney
